briefdescription.para: Initialization parameters for a Generic Location Client model instance.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a bt_mesh_loc_cli_handlers instance.

briefdescription.para: Generic Location Client model composition data entry.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a Generic Location Client model instance.

briefdescription.para: Get the global location of the bound srv.

detaileddescription.para: This call is blocking if the rsp buffer is non-NULL. Otherwise, this function will return, and the response will be passed to the bt_mesh_loc_cli_handlers::global_status callback.

parameterdescription.para: Client model to send on.
Message context, or NULL to use the configured publish parameters.
Global Location response buffer, or NULL to keep from blocking.
Successfully sent the message and populated the rsp buffer.
A blocking request is already in progress.
A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.
The request timed out without a response.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_mesh_loc_cli *cli, struct bt_mesh_msg_ctx *ctx, const struct bt_mesh_loc_global *loc, struct bt_mesh_loc_global *rsp)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_loc_cli_global_set

briefdescription.para: Set the Global Location in the server.

detaileddescription.para: This call is blocking if the rsp buffer is non-NULL. Otherwise, this function will return, and the response will be passed to the bt_mesh_loc_cli_handlers::global_status callback.

parameterdescription.para: Client model to send on.
Message context, or NULL to use the configured publish parameters.
New Global Location value to set.
Response status buffer, or NULL to keep from blocking.
Successfully sent the message and populated the rsp buffer.
A blocking request is already in progress.
A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.
The request timed out without a response.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_mesh_loc_cli *cli, struct bt_mesh_msg_ctx *ctx, const struct bt_mesh_loc_global *loc)
memberdef.name: bt_mesh_loc_cli_global_set_unack

briefdescription.para: Set the Global Location in the server without requesting a response.

parameterdescription.para: Client model to send on.
Message context, or NULL to use the configured publish parameters.
New Global Location value to set.
Successfully sent the message.
A message context was not provided and publishing is not configured.
The device has not been provisioned.

Successfully sent the message and populated the rsp buffer.
A blocking request is already in progress.

The device has not been provisioned.
The request timed out without a response.
